name: Dead Zombie Target - Shooter Hero
description:
Dead Zombie Target - Shooter Hero most advance zombies game is now available. Will you save the world from raging zombies? The mysterious silent town has become a Zombies booth and zombie are coming like a tsunami from everywhere. Get your sniper gun and target the zombies now! Save the mysterious silent town from zombies
Feature:
• Amazing Army sniper for best shooting accuracy
• Three full of fury modes each have 10 sub levels
• Fabulous modes ,level and scenes like building ,mountain , hospital etc
• Scary sound effects
• Breath taking real life graphics
